pullrequest.title: Add battery class (redo of pull request #1782)

content.raw:
It's not possible to pass the time delta directly through the `Update()` function because the `Battery` has no knowledge of the `World` and simulation time. We have also left the process of updating the battery to the user, so they can update the battery at any time cycle.

The implementation of `UpdateFunction` can keep track of time themselves. This is done in the `LinearBatteryPlugin`.
